name: Lavender
description: Lavender oil is known for its calming and relaxing properties, and has been used for alleviating insomnia, anxiety, depression, and restlessness.

name: Peppermint
description: Peppermint oil is used to soothe nausea and other stomach issues, as well as cooling skin and reducing muscle pain.

name: Tea Tree
description: Tea tree oil is known for its antiseptic properties and ability to treat wounds.

name: Eucalyptus
description: Eucalyptus oil is used for its refreshing and invigorating aroma. It's also known to ease congestion.

name: Lemon
description: Lemon oil is uplifting and cleansing. It's known for its detoxifying, antiseptic and anti-fungal properties.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile oil is calming, and promotes sleep and relaxation.

name: Frankincense
description: Frankincense oil is used for meditation and promoting calmness. It has rejuvenating and healing properties.

name: Rose
description: Rose oil promotes emotional well-being and has skincare benefits.

name: Sandalwood
description: Sandalwood oil is calming and helps in meditation. It also has skin benefits.

name: Jasmine
description: Jasmine oil has a romantic and uplifting scent. It's used for improving mood and promoting relaxation.
